Accounts¶

Purpose

  • extend the user model to include additional user profile information

  • extend the profile model to include third-party referrers

  • create a session log for all user authentications

  • cosmetic enhancements to standard user authentication forms

class apps.accounts.apps.ApplicatonConfig(app_name, app_module)¶

Models

class apps.accounts.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)¶

Extended user model with additional user information and identifiers

class apps.accounts.models.Referer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Referrer model with basic information including flag to determine whether Referrer can create cases (as opposed to enquiries)

class apps.accounts.models.SessionLog(*args, **kwargs)¶

Basic session log for all user authentication

apps.accounts.models.user_logged_in_handler(sender, request, user, **kwargs)¶

User log-in signal used to create entry in Session Log

Forms

class apps.accounts.forms.myLoginForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Override login form using Crispy form

class apps.accounts.forms.myPasswordResetConfirmForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Override new password form using Crispy form

class apps.accounts.forms.myPasswordResetForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Override password reset form using Crispy form
